Target: OntoMatPassport is an ontology developed for representing material passport of products and components.

Comment: An artefact manufactured in an industrial setting to meet the demands of consumers and usually consists of multiple parts.
Label: Product

Comment: Part of a bigger whole that can be a system or a product of composite nature.
Label: Component

Comment: A passport or document providing identification, physical, temporal, sustainability and other properties of a product or component.
Label: Material passport

Comment: A political entity associated with a territory considered a motherland to a nation ruled by a government.
Label: Country

Comment: A visual representation of an inanimate or animate object captured through technological means or drawn by humans.
A business, company or entity manufacturing goods for the consumer market.
Label: Manufacturer

Comment: A business, company or entity supplying goods to another business, company or entity.
Label: Supplier

Comment: A characteristic of an object that can be applied in determining its use in applications.
Label: Property

Comment: A property to express the physical aspect of an object.
Label: Physical property

Comment: A property to express the thermal aspect of an object.
Label: Thermal property

Comment: A property to express the temporal aspect of an object.
Label: Temporal property

Comment: A property to describe the composition aspect of an object.
Label: Composition property

Comment: A property to express the chemical aspect of an object.
Label: Chemical property

Comment: A property to express the biological feature of an object.
Label: Biological property

Comment: A property that expresses the circular economy aspect of an object.
Label: Sustainability property

Comment: A physical propertythat describes the dimension of an object.
Label: Dimension

Comment: A dimensional property expressing the height of an object.
Label: Height

Comment: A dimensional property expressing the width of an object.
Label: Width

Comment: A dimensional property expressing the length of an object.
Label: Length

Comment: A physical property to describe the mass of an object.
Label: Mass

Comment: A physical property that describes the density of an object.
Label: Density

Comment: The physical property of being stiff and resisting bending [WordNet 3.1]
Label: Rigidity

Comment: The rigidity of an object to shearing forces.
Label: Shear modulus

Comment: The elastic rigidity of an object to stress.
Label: Young's modulus

Comment: Any mechanical force that tends to retard or oppose motion [WordNet 3.1]
Label: Resistance

Comment: The resistance of an object to compressive forces.
Label: Compressive Strength

Comment: The resistance of an object to shearing forces.
Label: Shear strength

Comment: The resistance of an object to tensile forces.
Label: Tensile strength

Comment: A temporary property expressing the duration an object may serve its intended purpose.
Label: Expected lifetime

Comment: A temporary property expressing the duration an object may serve its intended purpose.
Label: Service life

Comment: A thermal property that describes the heat transfer coefficient of an object.
Label: Heat transfer coefficient

Comment: A thermal property that describes the capacity of an object to conduct heat.
Label: Thermal conductivity

Comment: A property that determines the ease and intensity with which an object can ignite and burn.
Label: Flammability

Comment: A property that indicates the degree to which a substance can be harmful or poisonous.
Label: Toxicity

Comment: A property expressing whether an object is entirely, partially or not biodegradable.
Label: Biodegradability

Comment: A material or part of a product or component.
Label: Constituent

Comment: A property to describe the type and amount of constituent materials belonging to an object.
Label: Constituent material

Comment: A part or component of a bigger whole or component or product.
Label: Constituent part

Comment: The fraction of feedstock from recycled products.
Label: Feedstock fraction from recycled product

Comment: The fraction of feedstock from reused products.
Label: Feedstock fraction from reused product

Comment: The proportion of material that moves from its origin as virgin materials to its final state as non-recyclable waste [Ellen MacArthur Foundation, 2015]
Label: Linear Flow Index

Comment: A measure of how circular the materials of a product are.
Label: Material Circularity Indicator

Comment: The fraction of a product collected for recycling.
Label: Product fraction collected for recycling

Comment: The fraction of a product collected for reuse.
Label: Product fraction collected for reuse

Comment: A sustainability property to describe the amount of recycled content used in manufacturing an object.
Label: Recycled content

Comment: The recycling efficiency of a portion collected from a product for recycling.
Label: Recycling efficiency for portion collected for recycling

Comment: The recycling efficiency in producing recycled feedstock.
Label: Recycling efficiency for producing feedstock

Comment: The mass of virgin content in a product.
Label: Virgin content mass

Comment: The mass of waste produced from an end-of-life product.
Label: Waste mass

Comment: The mass of waste that remains after the recyclable and reusable materials have been separated and that cannot be turned into useful materials.
Label: Waste mass after taking recyclable & reusable portion

Comment: The mass of waste generated while producing recycled feedstock.
Label: Waste mass generated in producing recylced feedstock

Comment: The mass of waste generated while recycling the collected portion of a product.
Label: Waste mass generated in recycling collected portion

Comment: The quantity of heat needed to increase the temperature of a material's unit mass by one unit.
Label: Specific heat

Domain: Product UNION Component
Comment: A narrative or detailed account of a product, component or material.
Label: Description

Domain: Product UNION Component
Comment: A datatype property that indicates if a product or component has an automatic tracking number in the form of a barcode or any other means.
Label: Automatic tracking/scanning

Domain: Product UNION Component
Comment: A datatype property expressing the European Article Number (EAN) of a product or component.
Label: EAN

Domain: Product UNION Component
Comment: The intended purpose of a product or component.
Label: Functionality

Domain: Product UNION Component
Comment: A datatype property expressing the Global Trade Item Number (GTIN) of a product or component.
Label: GTIN

Domain: Product UNION Component UNION Constituent Material UNION Constituent UNION Constituent Part
Comment: A datatype property expressing the Global Trade Item Number (GTIN) of a product or component.
Label: Id

Domain: Product UNION Component UNION Constituent Material UNION Constituent UNION Constituent Part
Comment: Indicates if a product or component is biodegradable or not.
Label: Is biodegradable

Domain: Product UNION Component UNION Constituent Material UNION Constituent UNION Constituent Part
Comment: Indicates if a product or component is decomposable or not.
Label: Is decomposable

Domain: Product UNION Component UNION Constituent Material UNION Constituent UNION Constituent Part
Comment: Indicates if a product or component poses any danger.
Label: Is hazardous

Domain: Product UNION Component UNION Constituent Material UNION Constituent UNION Constituent Part UNION Manufacturer UNION Supplier
Comment: A linguistic identity of a product, component or material.
Label: Name

Domain: Product UNION Component
Comment: A name that indicates the commercial brand of a product or component.
Label: Brand name

Comment: A string of numerals that expresses the identity of an object.
Label: Number

Domain: Manufacturer UNION Supplier
Comment: A number given to a manufacturer when registration is completed with a regulatory body.
Label: Registration number

Domain: Measure UNION FeedstockFractionFromRecycledProduct UNION FeedstockFractionFromReusedProduct UNION LinearFlowIndex UNION MaterialCircularityIndicator UNION ProductFractionCollectedForRecycling UNION ProductFractionCollectedForReuse
Comment: The numerical value of a measured quantity.
Label: Numerical Value

Domain: Image
Comment: The locatable address of an image on the web.
Label: URL

Domain: Product UNION Component UNION Constituent Material UNION Constituent UNION Constituent Part
Comment: A datatype property indicating the fraction of feedstock produced from recycled products or components.
Label: Feedstock fraction from recycled product

Domain: Product UNION Component UNION Constituent Material UNION Constituent UNION Constituent Part
Comment: A datatype property indicating the fraction of feedstock produced from reused sources.
Label: Feedstock fraction from reused product

Domain: Product UNION Component UNION Constituent Material UNION Constituent UNION Constituent Part
Comment: A datatype property indicating the fraction of mass of a product collected for recycling.
Label: Product fraction collected for recycling

Domain: Product UNION Component UNION Constituent Material UNION Constituent UNION Constituent Part
Comment: A datatype property indicating the fraction of mass of a product to be reused as a component.
Label: Product fraction collected for reuse

Domain: Product UNION Component UNION Constituent Material UNION Constituent UNION Constituent Part
Comment: A datatype property referring to the efficiency of the recycling process applied to the portion of a product collected for recycling.
Label: Recycling ffficiency for portion collected for recycling

Domain: Product UNION Component UNION Constituent Material UNION Constituent UNION Constituent Part
Comment: A datatype property referring to the efficiency of the recycling process in producing recycled feedstock.
Label: Recycling efficiency for producing feedstock

Domain: Product UNION Component UNION Constituent Material UNION Constituent UNION Constituent Part
Comment: A datatype property indicating the measure of how circular the materials of a product are.
Label: Circularity indicator

Domain: Product UNION Component UNION Constituent Material UNION Constituent UNION Constituent Part
Comment: A data property referring to the quantity of matter a constituent, product or component holds. The unit of represented quantity is kg.
Label: Mass

Domain: Product UNION Component UNION Constituent Material UNION Constituent UNION Constituent Part
Comment: A datatype property referring to the mass of waste produced from an end-of-life product. The unit of represented quantity is kg.
Label: Waste mass

Domain: Product UNION Component UNION Constituent Material UNION Constituent UNION Constituent Part
Comment: A datatype property indicating the mass of virgin content in a product. The unit of represented quantity is kg.
Label: Virgin content mass
